properties.areaDesc: Guam Coastal Waters; Tinian Coastal Waters; Saipan Coastal Waters; Rota Coastal Waters
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 10 at 6:30PM ChST until February 16 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
properties.description:
* WHAT...NORTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 25 KT. OCCASIONAL GUSTS UP TO 35 KT
WEDNESDAY AND WEDNESDAY NIGHT. COMBINED SEAS OF 5 TO 7 FEET TONIGHT
WILL BUILD TO 7 TO 9 FEET TUESDAY AND BETWEEN 9 TO 12 FEET BY
WEDNESDAY. SEAS COULD PEAK AT 11 TO 13 FEET FRIDAY.

* WHERE...WITHIN THE MARIANAS COASTAL WATERS.

* WHEN...THROUGH SATURDAY NIGHT.

* IMPACTS...CONDITIONS WILL BE HAZARDOUS TO SMALL CRAFT, WHICH COULD
BE CAPSIZED OR BLOWN OFF COURSE.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...THE HIGHEST SEAS WILL BE EAST OF THE MARIANAS.
properties.instruction:
INEXPERIENCED MARINERS, ESPECIALLY THOSE OPERATING SMALLER
VESSELS, SHOULD AVOID BOATING IN HAZARDOUS CONDITIONS.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY NIGHT
